Definition: This year identifies the school year during which the testing occurred.
Possible Values (or info about values): Will most likely be a year from 2015 up through 2023
Further explanation of value(s): For school year 2022-2023, 2023 will be the value displayed.

Definition: This is the district's four-digit code. Depending on how the data are formatted, leading zeros may or may not be present.
Possible Values (or info about values): Values only go up to four digits and never include alpha characters.

Definition: School number that is unique for schools within a district
Possible Values (or info about values): Typically a number that is up to three digits (alpha characters are never present).
Further explanation of value(s): Note that in Ed-Fi, when school numbers/codes in South Carolina are places with district codes, leading zeros on the school numbers are included. So for example, if a school's code is 22 for district 3333, then if these two codes are ever combined, the new code would be 3333022.

Definition: Name of the assessment (in this case "KRA")
Further explanation of value(s): The full name of the KRA is the Kindergarten Readiness Assessment. Context on this assessment is available on this SC Department of Education web page: https://ed.sc.gov/tests/elementary/kindergarten-readiness-assessment-kra/

Definition: This is a district-specific ID for the student. It is unique for the student within a district but is not unique within the state.
Possible Values (or info about values): Alpha characters will never be included
Further explanation of value(s): This identifier can be used to identify a unique student within a district.

Definition: This is a state-specific ID for the student. It is unique for ths student within the state.
Possible Values (or info about values): Alpha characters will never be included
Further explanation of value(s): This is the best identifier for matching students across the state.

Definition: Student's First Name
Possible Values (or info about values): Some names may include special characters

Definition: Student's Last Name
Possible Values (or info about values): Some names may include special characters

Definition: Student's Middle Name
Possible Values (or info about values): Some names may include special characters. Also, note that there may be quite a few NULL values.

Definition: Student's Date of Birth
This is presumably indicating information about how scores were notated. This field may not be needed but is being included for now.
This is the date the assessment was taken.
This is the calendar year during which the test was administered.
Possible Values (or info about values): Will most likely be a year from 2014 up through 2023.
Further explanation of value(s): For school year 2022-2023, the Test Administration year could be either 2022 or 2023 but will most likely be 2022 for KRA.

Definition: This is the overall scale score that determines a student's performance level.
Possible Values (or info about values): any value from 202 to 298 with the minimum score being 202 and the maximum score being 298
Further explanation of value(s): The θ scale is centered at 0 and extends in both positive and negative directions. Applying a linear transformation to the θ scale is desirable because it allows for a scale that is more easily understood by stakeholders and that does not include negative values. The θ scores determined by IRT scaling are converted using a linear transformation such that the scale score = 12* θ + 250. The KRA scale is truncated at θ scores of ±4, which results in minimum and maximum scale scores of 202 and 298, respectively.
corresponds to the Performance Level of Demonstrating Readiness
corresponds to the Performance Level of Approaching Readiness
corresponds to the Performance Level of Emerging Readiness

Definition: A value determined by the KRA overall scale score.

Further explanation of value(s):
A student demonstrates foundational skills and
behaviors that prepare him/her for a curriculum
based on kindergarten standards.

A student demonstrates some foundational
skills and behaviors that prepare him/her for a
curriculum based on kindergarten standards.

A student demonstrates minimal foundational
skills and behaviors that prepare him/her for a
curriculum based on kindergarten standards.

Definition: Completion status

Further explanation of value(s): All assessment items were completed
Some assessment items were not completed
All assessment items were completed although there was a no show
Not all assessment items were completed

Definition: Social Foundations Score
Further explanation of value(s): The domain scale scores are reported using the same scale as the overall score. Caution must be taken when interpreting domain scores, as these scores are determined by a subset of the items that compose the entire KRA, meaning that they provide a less-precise measure of ability.

Definition: Language and Literacy Score
Further explanation of value(s): The domain scale scores are reported using the same scale as the overall score. Caution must be taken when interpreting domain scores, as these scores are determined by a subset of the items that compose the entire KRA, meaning that they provide a less-precise measure of ability.
